description: Try our easy to follow Sambal Chicken Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sambal Chicken Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs coriander leaves, to garnish (to garnish)
1 lime, cut into wedges (to serve, optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine honey, soy, oil, sambal oelek, fish sauce and garlic in a bowl. Add chicken and stir until combined. Cover and marinate for 1 hour or overnight if time permits. Thread chicken onto small skewers.
Heat a chargrill over high heat. Cook skewers for 10 minutes or until charred on all sides and cooked through.

Meanwhile, bring a saucepan of water to the boil. Add bok choy and cook for 2 minutes or until just tender. Lift out with tongs and drain. Add noodles to boiling water and cook for 2 minutes or until separated. Drain.
Arrange noodles on plate, top with bok choy and skewers. Garnish with coriander and serve with lime wedges, if using.
